hadiths.text: It was narrated from Aishah that the Messenger of Allah said:"There are five kinds of vermin which may be killed out and inside the Haram: Crows, kites, vicious dogs, scorpions and mice

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُقْتَلُ فِي الْحَرَمِ مِنَ الدَّوَابِّ
chapter.eng-name: Which Animals May Be Killed In The Haram .
